word:
Chap. 8 - Heaven's Part in Life's Conflict

Manuscript 1, 1890

     [Sermon at Battle Creek, Michigan, February 1, 1890.] 

     [Ephesians 6:10-17, quoted.] 


     Now do we do it? Do we obey the very last verse that I have read? Do we take the helmet of salvation and the sword of the Spirit, which is the Word of God?
